description: Tell us about your tobacco products for home use

sections.title: Daily return of duty on deliveries and appropriations

fields.infoText: Enter the date of the schedules you want to tell us about

sections.title: What is your deferment guarantee limit

fields.label: What is a defement guarentee limit?
fields.infoText:
This is the amount you can defer, set by HMRC.

 Need more help text here

sections.title: How many delivery documents or schedules do you wish to tell us about?

fields.infoText:
You can include details of up to 20 documents or schedules on this form.

 If you need to tell us about more than this you will need to yadda yadda yadda etc.......

fields.infoText:
Throughout the next section you will need to refer to the latest duty rates for the following items

 * Cigarettes

* Cigars

 * Hand-rolling tobacco

 * Other smoking tobacco

 * Chewing tobacco

fields.label: Where do I find the latest duty rates?
fields.infoText:
You can find [Latest tobacco duty rates](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/rates-and-allowances-excise-duty-tobacco-duty/excise-duty-tobacco-duty-rates) here.

 We suggest that you boookmark this page and then open it in another window to reference whilst working on this form.

 You will need to press back in your browser to return to this form

fields.label: Number of cigarettes
fields.helpText: This number is calculated from the number of cigarettes you have entered on all the delivery documents and schedules
fields.value: ${delCigQuant1 + delCigQuant2 + delCigQuant3 + delCigQuant4 + delCigQuant5 + delCigQuant6 + delCigQuant7 + delCigQuant8 + delCigQuant9 + delCigQuant10 + delCigQuant11 + delCigQuant12 + delCigQuant13 + delCigQuant14 + delCigQuant15 + delCigQuant16 + delCigQuant17 + delCigQuant18 + delCigQuant19 + delCigQuant20}

fields.label: Value of cigarettes
fields.helpText: This number is calculated from the value of cigarettes you have entered on all the delivery documents and schedules
fields.value: ${delCigTotalValue1 + delCigTotalValue2 + delCigTotalValue3 + delCigTotalValue4 + delCigTotalValue5 + delCigTotalValue6 + delCigTotalValue7 + delCigTotalValue8 + delCigTotalValue9 + delCigTotalValue10 + delCigTotalValue11 + delCigTotalValue12 + delCigTotalValue13 + delCigTotalValue14 + delCigTotalValue15 + delCigTotalValue16 + delCigTotalValue17 + delCigTotalValue18 + delCigTotalValue19 + delCigTotalValue20}

sections.title: Current sterling duty rate per 1000 cigarettes

fields.label: Current sterling duty rate per 1000 cigarettes
fields.helpText: Enter the current sterling rate of duty including decimal points for example : 223.50 per 1000

fields.label: Current percentage duty rate
fields.helpText: enter the current percentage rate of duty for example 16.50

sections.title: Amount of excise due at percentage rate

fields.label: Amount of excise due at percentage rate

sections.title: Amount of excise due at Sterling rate

fields.label: Amount of excise due at Sterling rate
Excise duty payable on cigarettes
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by multiplying the quantity of cigarettes by the percentage rate per 1000 and then adding the sum of the retail value multiplied by the sterling rate

fields.label: Enter the latest minimum excise duty per 1000 cigarettes
Minimum excise duty
fields.helptext: This sum i scalculated by the number of 1000's of cigarettes you previously entered multiplied by the latest minimum excise duty per 1000 cigrettes

sections.title: Your total excise duty payable for cigarettes before surcharges or credits

fields.infoText: You are seeing this page because the amount of duty due based on the minimum excise duty is higher than the amount due based on the sum of the percentage value of retail price plus the base value of excise due per 1000 cigarettes

fields.label: Your total excise duty payable for cigarettes

sections.title: Your total excise duty payable for cigarettes before surcharges or credits

fields.infoText: You are seeing this page because the amount of duty due based on the sum of the percentage value of retail price plus the base value of excise due per 1000 cigarettes is higher than the amount of duty due based on the minimum excise duty

fields.label: Your total excise duty payable for cigarettes
Surcharges
fields.helpText: Enter the amount of any surcharges you have to pay on cigarettes

fields.label: Credits allowed
fields.helpText: Enter the amount of any credits allowed for cigarettes

fields.label: Your total excise duty payable for cigarettes
Your total excise duty payable for cigarettes
Quantity of cigars
fields.helpText: Enter the quantity in kilograms to two decimal places

fields.label: Current sterling duty rate
fields.helpText: Enter the current sterling rate of duty including decimal points for example : 223.50 per kg

fields.label: Excise duty payable on cigars
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by multiplying the quantity of cigars by the duty rate

fields.label: Quantity of hand rolling tobacco
fields.helpText: Enter the quantity in kilograms to two decimal places

fields.label: Current sterling duty rate
fields.helpText: Enter the current sterling rate of duty including decimal points for example : 223.50 per kg

sections.title: Excise duty payable on hand rolling tobacco

fields.label: Excise duty payable on hand rolling tobacco
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by multiplying the quantity of hand rolling tobacco by the duty rate

fields.label: Quantity of other smoking tobacco
fields.helpText: Enter the quantity in kilograms to two decimal places

fields.label: Current sterling duty rate
fields.helpText: Enter the current sterling rate of duty including decimal points for example : 223.50 per kg

sections.title: Excise duty payable on other smoking tobacco

fields.label: Excise duty payable on other smoking tobacco
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by multiplying the quantity of other smoking tobaccoo by the duty rate

fields.label: Quantity of chewing tobacco
fields.helpText: Enter the quantity in kilograms to two decimal places

fields.label: Current sterling duty rate
fields.helpText: Enter the current sterling rate of duty including decimal points for example : 223.50 per kg

sections.title: Excise duty payable on chewing tobacco

fields.label: Excise duty payable on chewing tobacco
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by multiplying the quantity of chewing tobacco by the duty rate

sections.title: Total Excise duty due for tobacco products (cigarettes at full rate)

fields.label: Total Excise duty due for tobacco products (cigarettes at full rate)
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by the addition of the duty due from the previous 5 sections

sections.title: Total Excise duty due for tobacco products (cigarettes at minimum rate)

fields.label: Total Excise duty due for tobacco products (cigarettes at minimum rate)
fields.helpText: This figure is calculated by the addition of the duty due from the previous 5 sections

fields.infoText:
Value for VAT  this can vary.

 If, whilst in warehouse, the goods have been subject to a supply, or additional services such as storage or handling, it may affect the VAT position.

  Note that the value for VAT must include Excise Duty in all cases (and customs duty if applicable).

fields.label: Where can i find more information about VAT and tobacco?
fields.infoText:
You can find [help with understanding VAT](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/imports-and-vat-notice-702) here.

 You will need to press back in your browser to return to this form

 It is advisable to use separate forms, clearly noted, for detailing EC free circulation goods subject to acquisition VAT procedures. In these cases complete the Value/Rate boxes and enter 'ACQ VAT' in the Amount of VAT box.

sections.title: Do you have any EC free circulation goods subject to acquisition VAT procedures to declare?

fields.label: Do you have any EC free circulation goods subject to acquisition VAT procedures to declare?
fields.helpText: We really need some help with this text

sections.title: Goods subject to acquisition VAT procedures

fields.label: Value for VAT
fields.helpText: Enter the sterling value of any goods subject to acquisition VAT procedures
Enter the VAT rate for any goods subject to acquisition VAT procedures, for example 16.50

fields.label: Amount of VAT
fields.helpText: Enter ACQ VAT in this box

sections.title: All other goods not subject to acquisition VAT procedures

fields.label: Value for VAT
fields.helpText: Enter the sterling value of all other goods not subject to acquisition VAT procedures

fields.label: VAT rate %
fields.helpText: Enter the VAT rate for all other goods not subject to acquisition VAT procedures, for example 16.50

fields.label: Value for VAT
fields.helpText: Enter the sterling value of all goods subject to VAT

fields.label: VAT rate %
fields.helpText: Enter the VAT rate for all goods subject to VAT, for example 16.50

declarationSection.title: Confirm details and send your return

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm weve received your return

fields.infoText:
# Declaration 
By submitting this return, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a copy of your submitted form as you wont be able to retrieve it later.
